name: friedcake
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small, circular cake or pastry, fried in hot fat, often with a hole in the middle: Success in making friedcakes depends on the cooking as much as the recipe itself. Use milk instad of butter in your recipe for lighter friedcakes. Synonym
doughnut
More examplesFewer examplesWe always had friedcakes for breakfast when I was a girl.I wolfed down two friedcakes covered with sugar.After school, we had friedcakes and a glass of milk each.She took a little round fried cake from her pocket.The waitress brought my coffee and a fried cake.
